name: TSINDIA 140 (2G)
description: The TSindia140 GPS Device is a rugged, AIS140 & BIS16833-certified tracker designed for all vehicle types. With IP65 protection, a 1000mAh backup battery, fast 30-second GPS cold start, and support for SOS panic button, driver behavior monitoring, and fuel/temperature/load sensors, it offers reliable performance and complete fleet control in any environment.

features.value: Government-mandated VLT and emergency button protocols
SOS, Over speeding, Harsh braking, Power cut, Geofence entry/exit

description.title: The TSindia140: Advanced Tech for Modern Fleets.
description.text: Certified for AIS140 and BIS16833, the TSindia140 is a next-generation GPS tracker engineered for total fleet control, regulatory compliance, and real-time visibility. Designed for vehicles of all kinds — from commercial fleets to heavy-duty machines — it delivers advanced features, remote management, and data-driven insights to maximize operational efficiency.

bulkOrders: We support large-scale deployment for fleet operators, system integrators, OEMs, and government projects. Special pricing, custom branding, and integration support available for orders of 50 units or more. Reach out to our sales team for volume discounts and tailored logistics.
